Text:
If somebody thinks the audio is a little distorted... I agree. But i assure you it sounds just the same in the original cd.

One of the few flaws of this great album.
FLAC is free, apple lossless is owned by Apple, support free software, please!!!!!!

I agree with ragnarock17
The sound is little distorted. I tought it was somebody who upload the mp3 with bad quality but when I heard the full cd in mp3, I decided to by the original cd and que quality was the same (little distorted), but fu** it. Those are great songs any ways.

For the next album, Flying Colors shoud talk with the guys who produced *Avenged Sevenfold - Nightmare* or the guys who produced *blink182 - Neighborhoods. Those albums have  the best quality I've heard.
